import{cartActions}from"../slices/cartSlice";// Add Item To Cart
export function addToCart(newItem){return function(dispatch,getState){try{// send request to server and get response
dispatch(cartActions.addItemToCart(newItem));var _getState=getState(),cart=_getState.cart;localStorage.setItem("cartItems",JSON.stringify(cart.cartItems));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};}// Remove From Cart
export function removeFromCart(id){return function(dispatch,getState){try{// send request to server and get response
dispatch(cartActions.removeItemFromCart(id));var _getState2=getState(),cart=_getState2.cart;localStorage.setItem("cartItems",JSON.stringify(cart.cartItems));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};}
